title: Intro to AI Ethics: Navigating the Future
summary: Join us for a foundational webinar on the ethical implications of artificial intelligence in our daily lives.
description: This 90-minute session will cover the basics of AI ethics, including bias in algorithms, data privacy concerns, and the societal impact of automation. We'll explore real-world case studies and discuss how individuals and organizations can promote responsible AI development. This event is perfect for beginners with no prior technical knowledge.

title: Cybersecurity for Small Businesses
summary: A hands-on workshop designed to equip small business owners with essential cybersecurity skills to protect their assets.
description: In this interactive workshop, we'll cover critical topics such as phishing prevention, strong password policies, secure data storage, and incident response planning. Participants will leave with a personalized action plan to improve their business's security posture. Laptops are recommended but not required.

title: The Future of Privacy in a Digital World
summary: A panel discussion with industry experts on the evolving landscape of digital privacy, data rights, and surveillance.
description: This event has concluded. Our expert panel discussed emerging privacy challenges, the impact of new regulations like GDPR and CCPA, and what the future holds for personal data protection. A full recap and recording are available.
